text:
Manifest ID: https://digital.library.villanova.edu/Item/vudl:13009/Manifest
Title: Historiae naturalis de quadrupedibus libri. Cum aeneis figuris. Johannes Jonstonus, Medicinae Doctor, concinnavit.
Part Of: Flora, Fauna, and the Human Form (https://digital.library.villanova.edu/Collection/vudl:7028/IIIF)
Summary: O QL41.J66 1657 Historiae naturalis de avibus libri VI, cum aeneis figuris; Historiae naturalis de piscibus et cetis libri V, cum aeneis figuris; Historiae naturalis de insectis libri III, cum aeneis figuris; Historiae naturalis de serpentibus, libri II; Historiae naturalis de exanguibus aquaticis libri IV, cum figuris Aeneis. Final part (p. 151-[164]) of Historiae naturalis de quadrupedibus libri consists of: Petri Castelli, Romani, Extasis de hyaena odorifera, zibethum gignente, quae civetta vulgo appellatur. Inconsistent pagination. Includes indices. Marginalia.
Full Title: Historiae naturalis de quadrupedibus libri. Cum aeneis figuris. Johannes Jonstonus, Medicinae Doctor, concinnavit.
Author: Jonstonus, Joannes, 1603-1675.Castelli, Pietro.
Date Added: 10 January 2014
Format: Book
Language: Latin
Publish Date: 1657
Publisher: Amstelodami [Netherlands]: Apud Ioannem Iacobi Fil. Schipper.
Source: Flora, Fauna, and the Human Form
Topic: Zoology > Pre-Linnean worksAnimals > Early works to 1800
About: More DetailsPermanent Link
